name: AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinatorSeekCommand
desc: A command that indicates to seek to a new time in the item timeline.

items.name: var shouldBufferInAnticipationOfPlayback: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player starts buffering in anticipation of a request to begin playback.

items.name: var anticipatedPlaybackRate: Float
items.desc: The rate at which the coordinator expects playback to resume.

items.name: var itemTime: CMTime
items.desc: The time to seek to in the item timeline.

items.name: var completionDueDate: Date?
items.desc: The deadline by which the coordinator expects the delegate to handle the command.
